item.description:
I know this Sunday is kind of last minute, but I got inspired to try and get something going in the club! If we can't get at least 5 RSVPs, I'll try in another time.
The location is in east Cambridge, a few blocks from the Lechmere station green line, about 10 from Kendall red line. RSVP for address and phone number.
I'm far from mastering Indian cuisine, and if it scares you, too, don't worry! If you're stumped just grab a frozen dish or samosas at Trader Joe's and join us anyway. Please bring your favorite beverage as well.
item.name: Indian Potluck
